titles.title: Prohibition of Incentives for Relocation Act of 1994
A bill to prohibit the use of certain assistance provided under the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 for employment relocation activities.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S11341-11342)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 8/11/1994--Introduced. Prohibition of Incentives for Relocation Act of 1994 - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to prohibit the use of specified grant and loan assistance for employment relocation activities.
